Articles.Content: It should be possible, but I\'m not very smart so I\'d never get it done. Maybe someone else, though...

The Death Star?

Something Large: Check

Incomplete: Check

Blows up at the drop of a hat?: Check Check Check!

Been their, done that!

Someone actually made a mod for a Death Star, it can be found here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[http://www.kspyard.com/mods/packages/Death+Star/#.T5x_Squm8sI](http://www.kspyard.com/mods/packages/Death+Star/#.T5x_Squm8sI)

It\'s already excist.

Bij addon release showcase you can find it.

Ps: that one is really huge.

Is any one else having trouble getting the part to show up? I have it installed to my parts folder but I cannot find it when I am playing the game. Any suggestions?

Also here is the original thread for the part in case anyone is curious.

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6739.0](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6739.0)
Well, I would be interested whether anyone could put a Death Star together using parts launched into orbit. And then hooked together. I bet it could be done in under 10,000 individual parts.

@infatuatedPP

If I remember, I think that it was so big that you can\'t see it as a parts icon in the VAB. Somewhere in your parts there should be a 'blank' spot/part that you can click on to grab it.

@ Chickenplucker

Aha, you are correct, it is sneakily hidden in the decals section. Thanks
